fromPort.description: Start port (or ICMP type number if protocol is `icmp`)

prefixListIds.description: List of prefix list IDs (for allowing access to VPC endpoints)

protocol.description: Protocol. If you select a protocol of "-1" (semantically equivalent to `all`, which is not a valid value here), you must specify a `from_port` and `to_port` equal to `0`. If not `icmp`, `tcp`, `udp`, or `-1` use the [protocol number](https://www.iana.org/assignments/protocol-numbers/protocol-numbers.xhtml).

securityGroups.description: List of security groups. A group name can be used relative to the default VPC. Otherwise, group ID.

self.description: Whether the security group itself will be added as a source to this egress rule.

toPort.description: End range port (or ICMP code if protocol is `icmp`).
